segments.text: Would you like to ask any questions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I need to know about the fees .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m asking about overdraft fees .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You have to pay a small fee every time you overdraft .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The fee is $ 25 every time you overdraft .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How is that a small fee ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That fee should keep you from overdrafting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have any more questions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t need to know anything else . Thank you .
segments.speaker: S2
